name: Manifold Stare
description: Your hypnotic gaze causes tremendous pain in its victims.
prerequisites: Mesmerist level 3rd, painful stare class feature.
benefit: You can trigger your painful stare one additional time per round.
special: This feat can be taken once by a 3rd-level mesmerist, and again when he reaches 9th and 15th levels. Its effects stack. A mesmerist can take this feat in place of a bold stare improvement<sup>OA</sup>.
